name: Project Orion (Brake_Stomper)
description:
Small game I made during University. It's not much but if anyone has fun playing it then it will be worth all the hours I sunk into it. 

Goal: 

Defend the Ark (the big ship) from the Aliens. If you die, you'll respawn but if the Ark is destroyed its game over. There are a few different ship variants you can choose from so give them each a try. The game features a leaderboard to track your best scores so you can try to improve and do better each time. Have fun!

Play Full Screen for best experience!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click

Restart - Tab

Quit - Q
